item.title: Hurricane Erin picking up steam as it edges along the East Coast
item.description: Hurricane Erin is strengthening again and forecasters say it could re-intensify into a major hurricane.

item.title: 2 more beachfront homes near collapse as Hurricane Erin’s waves pound North Carolina’s Outer Banks
What to know about powerful Hurricane Erin as it heads past the US East Coast
